description: Playful sexy hunks Connor Kline and Lance Luciano hook up in Chicago and compare notes on their IML/Grabby weekend experience. The live shoot takes place in a glass-walled high-rise overlooking the city and the guys are sure that people in the surrounding buildings can see them and it only makes them more horny. These guys are so much fun to watch you almost don't even care if they never get to the sex - almost. The first order of business is getting a good look at Connor's amazing bubble-butt. Lance can't resist eating it which gives Connor a raging hardon. Once the giant cocks come out it's on - these two guys can't get enough of each other.
title: Connor Kline And Lance Luciano, Scene #01
